description.value:
Potion, very rare
This deep purple potion swirls with glittering flashes of red, green, and blue and smells faintly of ozone. For 1 hour after drinking this potion, you gain the following benefits:

  • You have blindsight out to a range of 60 feet.
  • When you roll a 1 on an ability check, saving throw, or attack roll, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.
  • You can see into the Ethereal Plane. Ethereal creatures and objects appear ghostly and translucent.

    • When the duration ends, you are stunned until the end of your next turn as your mind reels from the loss of the mind-altering effects.
